asrsegments.said: to a liquor license approval we have to
liquor license renewals to approve
tonight one is a renewal from RN fishing
son doing business as Captain fish's
cruises and the other is a renewal for
the topside Inn they both been approved
or initials by the police chief I met
both been in business for a number of
years so all sexy oh okay good any
discussion any discussion from the
audience seeing none all in favor old
business we don't really have anything
cold business on the agenda I think I'll
just spend 30 seconds to say that I think
it was last week the board of Selectmen
met with the planning board to discuss
the new State marijuana law and we are
going to continue to move forward and at
some point over the next couple of months
we hope to have a an educational meeting
for the community members which will hold
at the YMCA the date is to be determined
so we're pretty excited about that and
the planning board the board of Selectmen
are going to be working over the next few
months after gauging the community
interest for any zoning ordinance changes
relative to the five particular aspects
of commercial marijuana as it relates to
the new marijuana law we may want to
mention just since this is being typed
that the legislature has passed a bill
delaying the implementation of retail and
cultivation and all the licenses and
permitting for the commercial both
cultivation and sale and testing of
marijuana so that's happened at the state
level which is frankly good for us gives
us more time to think about how we will
respond as a municipality but I believe
the moratorium imposed by the state
legislation is until next February is
that correct it's so that that leaves us
a good amount of time to figure out what
what is the best for the town of Boothbay
Harbor so right so we don't have anybody
else have any old business that they want
to bring up that is documented on the
agenda okay but there is no new business
is there a public forum tonight and there
are no warrants either I will say in the
interest of time we did hold an executive
session from 5:30 till about 5:55 under
MRSA Title 1 chapter 13 sections 1 and
405 60 and 60 we discussed property
acquisition for the town no decisions
were made so is there anything else to
come up before the board tonight well
then I will entertain a motion to adjourn
